Kirstin specialises in transforming complex data into clear, actionable solutions for both technical and non-technical teams. With experience across business, IT, and healthcare settings, Kirstin collaborates across functions to design tools in Tableau, Power BI, and R, focusing on solutions that are maintainable, scalable, and easy to use.

With a strong background in project management, Kirstin leads initiatives to ensure data solutions are effective and sustainable. Kirstin also mentors teams, providing training and knowledge sharing to build confidence in using data. Experienced in resource-constrained environments, Kirstin focuses on delivering practical solutions that meet organisational needs.
